msbt.message: Your birthday present was really something! I never expected that any of my friends would be so generous! I hope you'll let me give you this gift in return, because I want to show my appreciation.

I absolutely love the birthday gift that you gave me. I'm envious of your ability to find great presents. I'm not nearly as good at you are, but I do want to say thanks by sending along a little something.

Thanks for celebrating my birthday with me! I have to tell you that you were so generous with your gift, I wasn't sure how I could ever express my gratitude. I hope this thank you present might do that.

I really liked your birthday present. I was just looking at it and thinking back on my past year. I'm so glad we're friends! Here's a little gift I picked up to thank you for your friendship and for your generosity.

Thank you so much for the gift you gave me on my birthday. In return, I'm enclosing something for you. I'm really glad that we're friends. Here's looking forward to another great year of friendship and fun!

It was so good of you to help me celebrate my birthday. Thanks very much for the birthday present too! Today I went out and picked up this gift to show how much I appreciate your friendship. I hope you like it!
